area1.areaDescription: You're in the Hidden Leaf Village with no one to be seen everyone is gone.

area2.areaName: The Village Hidden in the Sand
area2.areaDescription: You're in the Village in the Sand, and Gaara is using his sand jutsu to protect the village thus creating a blinding sand storm.

hazard.hazardDesc: Tobi is here with the Akatsuki to take you.

area3.areaDescription: You're in the Jofuku Forest where the Chunin Exam is held.

hazard.hazardDesc: Sasuke was once here, and used his sharingan's amaterasu to light the whole area on fire.

area4.areaDescription: You're in Grove Street, San Andreas, land of the free.

area5.areaDescription: You're in the Atlanta Santa where your pride is held.

area6.areaDescription: You're in the Drew's skatepark where you can skateboard till your heart is content.

hazard.hazardDesc: Mr.s Clause is quite unsatisified, might be a good idea to get her some help.
